inn1.comm: and beaten on the drive first up as Morkel slants it full across the left hander
not he's beaten as he prods from the crease, Morkel making it climb from back of a length, and Warner is on his toes as he tries to play
Morkel puts in a lone shout for leg before as Warner misses a length ball, that pitched outside leg
bangs it in short at 138.8 kph, but a couple of feet down leg
awkwardly nudges this shortish delivery but is not getting the single as square leg comes in

that is a very sharp take from the keeper down the leg side, given not out, and South Africa review, no problems with Morkel's front foot, this is a proper lifter, has bounced sharply and thudded into Warner's glove, the umpires are pretty sure as they check HotSpot, and Warner is almost past the boundary by the time the umpire raises his finger
another climbing delivery, back of a length, far enough outside off to be left
and a big lbw shout first ball, but umpire Bowden says no, that pitched good length and came in a bit, hit him on the top of the flap and ball tracker says that is comfortably bouncing over
length ball left alone outside off, keeper has taken that over his head, there is some bounce out there alright
turned off the pad through square leg
pitched full, he is right forward to defend
hits the splice as Finch comes forward to block a length ball outside off
Watson strides forward to tightly defend a good length delivery outside off
Morkel is making it fly around, short of a length, left alone, and keeper takes that in front of his face
short of a length and wider, and an easier leave for Watson
goes after the width this time, but is beaten on the cut
slightly fuller outside off, he lifts the bat and lets it pass
overpitched, on the pad, and Watson reacts quickly, using the angle to clip it powerfully  in the air through square leg
walks out and pushes it to mid on
back of a length, coming in, bouncing, hits the thigh pad, and dribbles away down the pitch
clips the thigh pad again and runs to the keeper as Finch moves across
moves forward this time to push a length ball to the bowler
walks a long way out to a ball outside off and taps it away
good length delivery pushed square, point dives and stops it, Watson had taken a start, and there is a direct hit, but he is safely in
starts full into the pad, but Watson can't capitalise as he sends that straight to fine leg
that has cleared the deep forward square leg boundary, what a strike, Steyn overpitching into the pads again, and Finch leans forward to generate lots of power on the flick

he's gone this time, and the bowling change working, it is the taller Morkel who is positioned at mid on, Finch drives this angled length delivery on the up, and Morkel stretches his hands over his head to take it, Steyn pumps his fist and lets out a roar
and he's welcomed with a 140 kph short of a length ball that he gets across to and fends down into the pitch
moves forward, opens the face to adjust for the slight away shape and pushes to mid off
pitched a touch fuller, Smith behind the line to block
stretches forward to defend off a thick inside edge to square leg
that is a very confident shout from Philander, but umpire Bowden is unmoved, Watson rapped on the pad on the forward push, HotSpot shows a thin inside edge, it almost carried to the cordon
moves it in slightly to hit the pads again as Watson strides forward, but most of these are going over with so much bounce
is wary of the inward movement, but this lifts straight from back of a length and he opens the face to play
back of a length, played from the crease to point
right behind the line this time as he gets forward to defend
a thick edge runs along the ground past point as Smith pushes at a pitched up ball
quickly gets the bat down on this fullish ball to push to mid on
checks the drive on this 132 kph full delivery to cover
short of a length, moving away a tad, he lets it pass
shorter, and Smith does the swivel smoothly as pulls it into the ground through midwicket
flows into a drive now, he is in such good touch, but cover does well to stop a high ball
not really the length to get forward to in hindsight as this leaves Watson and climbs past the outside edge
he is across on the back foot to defend a short of a length ball this time
arches back a tad and runs this past the cordon to third man
straightish back of a length ball outside off, Smith leaves
moving away slightly from short of a length, another leave from Smith
walks across to try and nudge this to leg, but it jags in from back of a length, and he cannot get it off the pitch
113.7 kph full delivery, after all those thunderbolts so far, Watson slams it off the front foot to mid off
full and wide, put-me-away delivery, Watson drives through cover
much better from the bowler as he brings a length ball in to catch Watson on the pad on the forward push, perhaps outside the line of off
cut hard into the ground past point
length ball into the pad, Watson turns it straight to short fine leg
moves forward and defends an incoming length ball to the bowler
that has zipped past the outside edge, much fuller than Morkel's typical length, Smith jabs at it, but it holds the line to beat him
this comes in sharply but not close enough to make him play, Smith raises the bat high
slips away to vacant short fine leg and keeper goes after it
Watson escapes, that is a dolly of a catch if it was not in the gap between extra cover and mid off, he ended up popping the drive in the air
overpitched around off, whipped to mid on
Watson reaches out and drives, but extra cover cuts it off with a sprint to his right

well, well, the part-timer has taken out Shane Watson, and he is not reviewing, Behardien angles it in on a length, it moves in late a bit too, Watson's bat has to come around that big front foot, it cannot do so quickly enough, and he is given straight away, tracker says that is hitting middle and leg near the top
eases forward to a length ball and pushes to covers
they go to the third umpire for a direct hit, but Smith is home after Bailey nudged in front of midwicket
sprayed quite far outside off
bowled full for the drive, Smith pings extra cover with the shot
length ball into the pad and Smith moves across to nudge it past the keeper
goes back in the crease to one rising from good length, and pats it away
this climbs in to him, he walks across, and fends it off one hand down to fine leg

that is probably not the best stroke to play at this stage, Morkel bangs it in short of a length, Smith tries to force a pull, and Tahir takes the steepling top edge after moving to his left from mid on, mid off was around too, but Tahir hung on in the end, wasn't really the length for the pull
back of a length, nudged to square leg
bounces and hits the bat sharply outside off, and goes down to third man
pitched up outside off, driven to mid off
short of a length, guided to point
angled into the pad, rolls to backward square leg

could have played on there, pushed forward to this length ball and inside edged it past the stumps, Morkel goes sprawling at fine leg, palms it in, it brushes his leg, but he's touched the rope after that
moving into the pad again, and worked behind square
leans forward and taps it to mid on
this hangs in the air for a while as it comes slow and full outside off, he waits and ensure he hits the drive between short extra cover and mid off

almost another one, he spooned that drive in the air as he didn't really get forward to a full one, de Villiers ran to his right and dived full length but it still landed short, he then got up and hared after it, superman AB
beaten now as he prods at a lifter outside off
bowled wider outside off, and left alone even as it comes in a bit
short of a length, he rides the bounce and taps it to point
Marsh survives again, he was not in control as he pulled, ended up dragging it just over mid on
back of a length, moving away just a bit, left alone
leading edge along the ground between cover and point as he tries to work a length ball to leg
right on off stump, good length, defended to the bowler
straightens around middle and off, he is moving across and adjusts to whip it down the pitch
follows the line of this away going length ball and pushes to cover
good length, just outside off, he defends solidly
width for the drive and Marsh does that confidently, hitting the gap at cover and timing it well enough to easily beat the chasing fielder
straightens on middle, defended
nice bit of flight, he is drawn out, but not near the pitch and has to block
defended to the bowler off the front foot
quicker and shortish, worked past midwicket
short again, on off,  and punched down to long on
flights it nicely this time, he pushes with the turn to point
almost played on, almost, he was back on his toes in the crease trying to defend, it hit the bat, went down into the crease and bounced just past the stumps
short of a length ball worked behind square leg
behind the line of a good length ball to push to covers
has a flash at a wide length ball, and is beaten
hops on the crease to push a short of a length ball away
opens the face, runs it straight to point, and is not getting the single even as he trots out
pushes loosely at this good length legbreak from the crease and squeezes it to short third man
walks across to a googly and taps it behind square
nudges off the front foot square on the leg side for a quick single
draws him forward and beats the outside edge with a flighted, dipping delivery
skips out, reaches the pitch and hits it down to long on
is forward to a fuller one to collect a single to long on
Behardien starts his second spell with a full delivery that is driven straight to extra cover
drives off the front foot to the sweeper
back of a length, angled in, he moves across and works it in front of square
overpitched outside off, Bailey waits and smacks it to sweeper cover
pushed through covers for a single
flighted full on middle, turned to deep midwicket
bowled slower and he waits on the front foot to play it out
driven hard, AB flies to his right and half stop it, recovers fast enough to prevent the single
pushed back to the bowler
walks across to turn one off middle to square leg
turned off the pad to deep square
length ball on the pad, clipped to deep midwicket
waits for a length ball to arrive, and dabs it to third man
back of a length, nudged to square leg
good length ball outside off dabbed down to third man
full ball turned straight to midwicket
bounces from a length outside off and is left alone
walks out to a flighted ball and pushes to extra cover
slams an overpitched ball to the sweeper cover
flighted ball on middle, pushed to long on
squeezes a full delivery to cover
tossed up on off stump line, he is forward to defend
beaten by the legbreak, turn and bounce as Bailey stretches forward
moves across to a length ball and pushes it to the bowler
tries to drive a wider one but mistimes it
short of a length, he defends tightly to covers
pings short extra cover with a drive
that went through him, came in off the seam and beat the inside edge on the drive
that drive has beaten backward point's dive and sweeper has a lot of running to do
googly comes in around off, is worked to mid on
whips a fuller one to midwicket
takes a flighted ball on the full and drives to long on
fuller and just straying on to the pad, he works it fine, well wide of short fine leg, who runs and slides, in vain
low full toss down the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
jumps out to a tossed up ball and cracks it to short extra cover
driven straight down the ground
tries to dab a length ball close to off to third man, and is beaten by the bounce
defends a good length ball to off
he's taken the risk and it has paid off, walked across and bent to a length ball on off stump, and used the angle to swing it past short fine leg
punches it off the back foot to the bowler
would have been a wide, but Bailey reaches for the high full toss and slams it to the sweeper's right, not far enough though
punched off the back foot, and a bit of a thick edge as it flies down to third man
edged, but short of the keeper as Bailey tried to run to third man

Philander strikes immediately on comeback, and that is a fine catch by Faf, another one falls to the pull, Bailey wasn't on top of the stroke as he hit it off the front foot low to Faf at mid on, and he went down to pouch it
back of a length, worked to square leg
lovely, Wade is opened up as he tries to defend one that leaves him slightly after pitching
fullish around off, driven to cover where Faf dives to stop the ball
full around off stump, steered past cover point for one
flighted and full outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
flighted, low full toss on the pads, pushed back to Tahir
full on the pads again, tucked towards midwicket for one
length delivery outside off is pushed down to mid-off
fuller outside the off stump, driven to cover off the front foot
length delivery on off stump, Wade defends it back to the bowler
touch fuller outside off, Wade can't clear cover this time
goes short and Wade hammers that to the backward square leg boundary with a pull for four. Saw the length and went back to pivot on the back foot and beat deep square leg
beaten this time! Length delivery outside off, Wade didn't move his feet much and poked, missed the outside edge as the ball angled across
full and flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
pitched up outside off, driven through the covers
length delivery on off, pushed back to Tahir
googly around length outside off, driven with an inside edge on the leg side
beats him with the googly! Pitched around off on length, Wade leaned forward to defend and was beaten by the turn
pitched up on off now, driven down easily to long off for one
back of length on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one. They considered the second but decided against it
fullish outside off, turned straight to midwicket
length delivery outside off, defends it to cover with a forward lean
takes a step down towards off for the back of length delivery, the ball cuts in and inside edge goes on the leg side
full and outside leg, clipped off the pads to fine leg
drives the length delivery down to long off from outside off
drifting towards the stumps, clipped straight to short fine leg
was the googly but he had a big stride out and tapped it to the bowler
charges out and whips it hard straight back to Tahir, it pops out of his hands and rolls down the ground
that could be close, de Kock was some way from the stumps when the throw came to him and by the time he reached to remove the bails, Marsh had stretched his bat in
full ball clipped straight to midwicket
full on the stumps, flicked down to long-on for one
mistimes the drive to mid off
pushes a length ball to mid off
goes for the pull but hits it to the right of mid on
back of a length nudged to square leg
pitched up around leg, tapped back to the bowler
that is just past Amla's dive at lone slip as Wade glides this short of a length ball
back of a length, worked down to long on
drives to mid off for a quick single
another drive, down to long off
takes on Morkel again at mid off for the single and easily makes it
short of a length, worked past midwicket;s dive, Morkel is at long on now, and he keeps them to one
short of a length, wide, moving away a tad, he goes for a cut and is beaten
rare misfield from AB at extra cover as he rushes to his right to this solid push from Marsh
hit on the thigh pad as he misses this back of a length ball
he walks across to off stump, takes this length ball off middle, and turns it to fine leg, that could have been tight
Marsh is middling these length deliveries, not much of a forward stride, he's just taking half a step out, he's smacked one straight back at Steyn, and it has burst away from the bowler
Wade cuts, to square third man
walks outside off to a length ball slanted across, and lets it go, it thuds into the keeper's gloves

Keeper and bowler are convinced about the caught behind, umpire isnt, de Kock is pushing for the review immediately, and South Africa are doing that, Wade on the hop to a short of a length ball into the ribcage, it has brushed his shirt, third umpire says that is close to the glove, and wants to look at HotSpot, there is a faint remark on the bottom of the glove, they move on to Snicko, umpire wants to look at front angle again now, says he is happy with that shot, wants to go back to HotSpot now, says there is a mark, and goes back to the onfield umpire to tell him about the HotSpot mark, and asks him to change the decision to out
gathers himself to defend a back of a length ball

it is coming apart for Australia, as Morkel removes Maxwell for a duck, he was on his toes trying to run this short of a length ball towards third man, ends up playing on, again, you have to say that is not a good choice of stroke off your second ball
this rises from just back of a length and Johnson nudges it down to fine leg
overpitched, driven to mid off
gets back in the crease and defends a short of a length ball
good length, slanted across, left alone
similar line and length, Johnson lets it pass, it swings in sharply into the keeper as it nears him
nice solid push from Johnson to the right of mid off
moves across outside off and pushes this into the pitch, it bounces over the bowler to long off
opens the face and squeezes a length ball down to third man
five for Morkel, and he jumps in celebration, Johnson stuck on the crease to one that leaves him with the angle close to off, and nicks it through to the keeper
thick edge to third man now as Coulter-Nile defends from the crease
moves forward and pushes to covers
tries to work a short of a length ball off the pad, ends up popping it in the air in front of square
lifts the bat and allows a lifter to rush past outside off
sharp back of a length ball hits the defensive bat hard and rolls to covers
drives with an open face to backward point
hit on the thigh pad as he misses after walking across to a short of a length ball
punches from the crease wide of extra cover for a single
straightish delivery left alone outside off
wanted to clobber this length ball through midwicket, inside edged it onto pad instead
opens the face on a length ball and runs it to point
that is fifty for Marsh, he's used the angle on this short of a length ball and guided it past short fine leg, quite a sensible innings this
now he drives off the front foot, to sweeper cover
leaves alone a climbing delivery outside off
a hand comes off the bat as he flays this overpitched ball to the sweeper
Marsh has been reaching on to that front foot without trouble this innings, does that again, finds extra cover
wanted to whip it with the angle through midwicket, it ends up at point, seemed to be inside edge on to pad
beauty from Steyn, just held the line on a good length on off stump to zip past the edge, he wasn't exactly playing forward to it too

nine down, Faf in business at mid on again, a length ball around middle and off, Coulter-Nile whips it for a tumbling Faf to take his second catch, not easy to pull off these shots with the pace and bounce in the pitch
short ball slanted across, left alone
another leave outside off as he slants it widish
holds bat close to the body and sways inside the line of a shortish ball
charges out first ball, and swings, but misses and takes it on the pad
rather short from Tahir as Marsh comes out again and hits to midwicket
he connects big this time, fetches this full and wide one and slogs it over the long on boundary
googly, Marsh swings it powerfully behind square leg, didn't quite time it
works a full delivery to midwicket
gets a short ball and works it calmly to deep midwicket to keep the strike
ouch, he had a swipe at this length ball and inside edged it right onto the box, went down on his knees immediately
he's flat batted Steyn over the long off boundary, back of a length ball, he wallops it off the front foot
Steyn slips it full down the leg side now
this is some hitting, as Marsh makes a bit of room and hammers it flat down to long off, does not takes the single in the end
it is hard to clear Morne Morkel wherever he is, he is at short fine leg, this is a slower one into the pad, and Marsh has flicked it for Morkel to take it over his head

inn2.comm: back of a length, rising outside off, left alone
shorter this time and flying high, too high, say the umpires
back of a length, pushed to covers
overpitched on off, and de Kock extends his arms to drive it nicely in the big gap at extra cover
moving away a tad from just back of a length, de Kock shuffles across and lets it be
more movement away from the left hander, who shoulders arms
back of a length, tapped to covers
full and wide, Amla drags the drive to cover, who moves quickly to stop it
walks across to off and punches to point
rising sharply from short of a length, moving in a tad, he raises the bat high and lets it pass
pushes at this length ball from the crease, it bounces, hits close to the splice and runs to third man
defends a good length ball on off stump to the bowler

first one down, Watson the man at first slip who jumps high to catch this thick edge of a cut, was short and wide from Hazlewood, replays show a fly was bothering de Kock, and had settled close to his left eye as he lined up to play that cut
hits the pitch and bounces high at 142.5 kph, Amla sways inside the line as it angles across
back of a length, Amla pushes to short extra cover
goes for the cover drive but closes the bat face early and the ball rolls to the leg side
that has gone through him, ripper this one, short of a length, moves in a long way after pitching, and goes past the inside edge
full and wide, dabbed to point
good length this time, coming back a little, worked to mid on
steep bounce and away movement from short of a length, and Faf is beaten by miles as he prods
this moves in now from just back of a length, Faf leaves
pitched up, moving away, he is not pushing at it, and withdraws the bat
lovely, this is angled in, Faf shaped up to defend off the back foot, it holds the line and comfortably beats the outside edge
targets the stumps with a much fuller length, Faf solidly pushes to mid on
short and wide, Faf cuts, but unlike de Kock, he gets more bat on it, and it flies over the cordon
dropped, Amla edges a drive to Finch's right at second slip as he drives without getting forward, it was travelling, and needed Finch to leap, but was at catchable height, went through his hands
Amla moves across, Johnson goes full and too wide
nicely done, this straightened from back of a length, but Amla was in control of the punch through point
nearly a yorker, dug out to mid off
Johnson pitches it up and Amla lofts from the crease, hits it cleanly over mid off, who runs after it and pulls it back just inside the rope
full and wide, he looks to play it, but lets it be in the end
digs in the bouncer, Amla ducks safely
guides a back of a length ball behind point, but gully dives to stop it
hit high on the pad as he misses one that is angled in from a length
hits the bat high as Amla moves across to play this length ball, he jabs it to the cordon
short and wide, moving away, left alone
moves away from a good length, he raises the bat high
straightens outside off stump after starting across, he does not play at it
length ball slanted across, he lets it go again
stays in the crease, gets behind the line of a rising length ball and pushes to covers
rols wrists over the pull as he plays it through square leg
they have the big one, Amla arched back and tried to upper cut this bouncer over the cordon, only managed an edge through to the keeper
pitches it up just outside off, Rossouw leans across and defends to point, who misfields
another misfield at square leg as Rossouw works it off the pads
back of a length delivery worked to midwicket
edged between the slips and gully to third man, but he was playing that length ball softly and it ran along the ground
Wade takes it down the leg side with a dive, but nothing from him even though the crowd is excited, that probably took the pad on its way
pulled into the ground down to deep midwicket
turned off the pad to square leg
uses the angle on a length ball and turns it to deep square
moves across and pushes a good length ball off middle to the leg side
drives off the front foot quite solidly to mid off
another fine drive as he slants it full across Rossouw, that has beaten mid off's dive and has raced to the boundary
overpitched on the pad and Rossouw has clipped that past midwicket, and it is too far from the man at deep square
four more, Rossouw pushes softly again as another one leaves him, and opens the face a bit, it runs along the turf past the slips
whipped off the pad to deep square leg
beaten this time, as he pushes at a short of a length ball angled across, he has been fine with the length balls, but this was much shorter
this is pitched up now and Rossouw is at ease as he takes a step forward and strokes it to the deep extra cover boundary
another crisp drive, and it needs a dive from Maxwell at point to save a few runs
full and wide, Rossouw has taken a liking to anything pitched up, and he's flayed this through the covers
swivels and pulls comfortably to deep midwicket
Rossouw pulls now, in the air, just past the umpire, down to deep square leg

Faf has been given leg before, but he's reviewed immediately, length ball angled in, does not seem to be an inside edge as Faf tries to work it to leg, nothing on HotSpot, but ball tracker says it is doing too much with the angle and missing leg stump
could have been gone this time, as he top-edged a hook, but it fell short at deep backward square leg
punched off the back foot to point
moves across to a length ball on middle and turns it square to leg
starts with a length ball on off which is pushed to extra cover
shortish, not rising alarmingly, swung to deep square leg
hits the pads high as he brings it in from back of a length, Faf was stuck back in the crease
pushed off the front foot to mid off
short at 138.7 kph, he has a look and lets it go over
takes it from just outside off and turns it between midwicket and mid on
gets behind the line to defend a short of a length ball
pushes a short of a length ball to short extra cover
slants it across on a good length, Rossouw lets it travel past close to off
defends a good length ball back to the bowler
short ball rises just down the leg side as Rossouw walks across
flies outside leg stump as he bangs it in short again
left alone outside off stump
Rossouw has played some lovely drives off the front foot and now he punches on the up, timing this through the covers
beaten on the inside edge as he has a go at another drive, that length ball came in a tad
tossed up and turns down the leg side, Wade removes the bails, but Faf's back foot was always in
comes across and punches an offbreak to midwicket
turned off the pad to deep square leg
Maxwell has taken a wicket in his first over, Rossouw has gone hard at a tossed up, full and wide ball, and the thick edge has flown to Smith at slip
is away first ball with a clip through midwicket, the fielder is pretty square, and they take two easily
slip is vacant, AB has walked across, and dabbed it very fine past the keeper
turn and bounce, but down the leg side, and goes between keeper and leg slip

AB has almost holed out here, what was he doing, long on was back on the boundary, AB charged out and swung it down towards him, fortunately he has mishit it, and it has fallen short of the fielder diving forward
goes full for the stumps, AB pushes firmly to mid on
is bounced around off, and swings hard at the pull, it is in the air through vacant midwicket and wide of the fielder in the deep
that came in and wasn't far from off stump but AB has left it so casually as if it was a wide
opens the face and guides it to point
hops and nudges an angled back of a length ball to midwicket, and there is an overthrow too
left alone outside off to bring on drinks
low full toss pushed to midwicket
full and spinning in to the pad, worked square
played with the spin to deep midwicket
goes back to punch as this offbreak hurries in
leaves the crease as Maxwell tosses it up, Faf nudges to midwicket
turned to square leg with the spin
that has been dismissed to the deep extra cover boundary, a stride forward and a clean, confident drive with a slightly open face to hit the gap
takes a step across, flows into the line of this length ball and dispatches it between extra cover and mid off now
worked behind square leg
opens the face to defend a good length ball to point
appears to go hard but checks his push to mid on in the end
this time he will beat mid on easily to his left, full again and he's driven it hard down the ground
pushes an offbreak to covers
this is cut high in the air but over and wide of short third man
bounces and spins down the leg side
went straight on outside off, AB chops the cut and it runs past the keeper
has a go at the cut but is beaten
punched off the back foot to extra cover
cuts again, but cover runs to his right to stop it
pushes a length ball softly to cover
whoa, Johnson has been smeared dead straight down the ground, this is a length ball slanted across, he has closed the face and just smacked it
he's walked across to off now, this has arrived short, and he's got on top of it to shovel it down to the fine leg boundary
take that, one more, Johnson slants it wide, and AB crashes it between extra cover and mid off
back of a length, cramping him for room, he pats it back to the bowler
Hazlewood has struck, this is a steep bouncer, Faf wants to hook, but he has only managed a thin edge through to Wade
he's lasted one ball, Hazlewood has two in two, not as short as the one that got Faf, but a lifter outside off nevertheless, Behardien hops and awkwardly fends it, straight to gully
length ball slanted across, but he is able to defend with a slightly closed face
rises with this short of a length ball and chops it into the crease
leans into a length ball and pushes it down the track, they think about a single, but mid on cuts it off
AB tries to play an awkward attacking forehand type slap to this short of a length ball leaving him on the angle, and is beaten
inside edge in front of square leg now, they rush back for the second and a dive is needed, all happening suddenly
AB hit on the chest now as he under edges an attempted pull
the timing has gone too suddenly, as AB gets too far across and chops it into the ground
hits the pad and pops up in the air, he fell too far across trying to work a length ball to leg
Johnson bangs it in and AB he is made to hop and fend this one handed down the leg side
moves in from short of a length and is left alone close to off
AB edges the hook to a bouncer headed down leg, but it has gone well clear of a diving Wade
moves across outside off and turns the wrists to play it softly towards point
pitched up and pushed neatly to mid on
back of a length, outside off, he walks across and lifts bat high
he takes this high bouncer and drags it into the ground through midwicket
back of a length, angled in, awkwardly jabbed to square leg from close to the splice
gets on top of the bouncer and smacks a pull to deep square leg
moves forward to push a length delivery through the covers
141 kph and climbs into Miller, who rides the bounce and brings it down safely
Johnson pings in a bouncer, Miller lets it pass over
nearly 142 kph, angled and rising into the body, he moves across and jabs it down, taking a hand off the bat
length ball clipped with the angle in front of square leg
Miller is beaten, Hazlewood starts it across on an angle and it moves further away after pitching as Miller pushes forward
brings down a short ball but square leg is around to keep him on strike
edged, but falling short of gully diving to his right as Miller pushes at this length ball
eases a pitched up ball down the track on the off side
checks his pull off the front foot to square leg
short of a length, tapped to the cordon
short of a length ball worked nicely off the pad but a quite short fine leg stops it
they are attacking him with angled bouncers, Millers keeps another one down on the pitch, off the glove
not as short this time, he leans across and pushes it down the pitch
Johnson digs in the bouncer too short with plenty of effort, and it flies over Wade's who only gets some glove on it as he jumps
leans forward to defend a good length ball
a slower bouncer too now, at 117.6 kph, Miller swings and misses
another bouncer, Miller sways inside the line, it is called a no-ball as Johnson has bowled one too many for the over
he pitches it up last ball of the over, but Miller is up to it, he leans forward and dispatches it through vacant mid off
back of a length, left alone outside off
shortish and down the pads, AB swings it down to fine leg
slanted across on a good length, left alone
back of a length, moves away after pitching, and leaves Miller feeling for it off the back foot
pulls to the right of Johnson at fine leg
this game is not done yet, AB is gone now, AB chipped out and tried to drive, only to thick edge it through to the keeper, Hazlewood has his fourth
Miller almost settles the issue as he leans into another drive, closing the face to a pitched up delivery around off to drive it past the non-striker
turned off the pad behind square for two more
rides the bounc on this back of a length ball to drop it into the pitch
swivels and pulls hard, but he's not middled it, and it has not gone far from midwicket
four more for Miller, Coulter-Nile overpitches, and Miller eases it between extra cover and mid off
pings short extra cover as he middles another full delivery
five for Hazlewood as he makes Philander jump with a steep bouncer, it pops up towards gully, who takes it safely despite Warner running almost in his way from the slips
angled in good length to Steyn, who pushes it away safely
backs away, swishes and misses, Wade goes up for caught behind in hope
Steyn does it by clearing front leg and whacking this length delivery over the bowler
